relation: Play the "Gun Stripping" minigame in the OPFOR space.
Complete the "Gun Stripping" minigame in the OPFOR space with a time below 30 seconds.
Collect all 7 pieces of the Golden AK47 from the TOC and OPFOR spaces.
Complete the "Golden AK47 Assembly" minigame in the OPFOR space with a time below 12 seconds.
Play the "5-Finger Fillet" minigame in the OPFOR space.

textAfterTable: Enter these in the HoloPad to unlock the butterflies for the Stapler Quests Effect Code "A foreign language" VANESSAATALANTA "Co-ordination" LAMADDALENA "Getting to know me" AUTOMATIC "The big picture" BADACSONYTOMAJ The first code you need after you find the three pieces of paper 17PARIS Contributed By: RXB17. 3 1 Passwords Xi Alumni T-Shirt After completing Xi, go back to The Hub and enter 688824 in the keypad to unlock the Xi Alumni T-Shirt. Contributed By: CaptainQwark18. 3 0 Unlockables Arcade machine unlockables These are the unlockables for the US version of Home. These must be completed in the US arcade. These also apply to the EU version Unlockable How to Unlock Echochrome Outfit(gloves, shirt, pants, shoes) Receive 4000 points on Level A
